text.div:
COVID19 HCPCS Value Set for Dialysis Services

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G0257 Unscheduled or emergency dialysis treatment for an esrd patient in a hospital outpatient department that is not certified as an esrd facility

name: COVID19 HCPCS Value Set for Dialysis Services

concept.display: Unscheduled or emergency dialysis treatment for an esrd patient in a hospital outpatient department that is not certified as an esrd facility
